This is an attractive and comfortable sweater, light enough to wear in warm weather, no peekaboo holes, and just as vibrant in color as it appeared in the photos (I ordered the pink).  I took the precaution of rinsing it by hand before washing it in the machine, and there wasn’t a lot of dye runoff.  It has held up well through two machine washes to date.  The relaxed fit makes it a good choice for those of us battling muffin tops.  I’d recommend this sweater for anyone looking to add to their fall wardrobe.
